elkfed.coref.mentions

Class Mention

  • java.lang.Object
    • elkfed.coref.mentions.Mention
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Mention>

    public class Mention
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Mention>
    Takes a markable and wraps it in a mention object. Information about the mention (ex: gender information, plurality, etc.) is determined as well.
    Author:
    vae2101

      • getSentenceTreeWithDiscurseIdsInLeaves

        private edu.stanford.nlp.trees.Tree getSentenceTreeWithDiscurseIdsInLeaves(edu.stanford.nlp.trees.Tree sentTree)
        Takes the sentence tree of this mention and replaces the unlexicalized tokens in the leaves with their discourse ids. Usefull to derive spans based on syntax.
        Parameters:
        sentTree - original sentence tree
        Returns:
        Tree with discourse ids in leaves

      • overlapsWith

        public boolean overlapsWith(Mention m)
        see if two mentions have overlapping spans - actually, a better approximation to syntactic embedding would probably make sense here, as in [1 the guardian] of [2[3 his] treasure] we would like to allow 1--3, but not 1--2(?)
